mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction (tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date) VALUES (seq_transaction_tran_no.NEXTVAL, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{dlvyAddr}, #{dlvyRequest}, 0, SYSDATE, to_date(#{dlvyDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date FROM product WHERE prod_no = #{value}
mapper.sql: SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.prod_detail, p.manufacture_day, p.price, p.image_file, p.reg_date, t.tran_status_code FROM product p LEFT JOIN transaction t ON t.prod_no = p.prod_no
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM (
p.prod_no LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
p.prod_name LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
p.price LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY p.prod_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
